bibl.title: Polybius, Rome and the Hellenistic World. Essays and Reflections.
bibl.note: Reproduction de 19 articles (1948-2000) et 1 contribution inédite. - Pp. 352-353: Index. Inscriptions, coins and papyri.
WALBANK Frank W., Polybius, Rome and the Hellenistic World. Essays and Reflections.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2002, 8°, xiv-353 pp. ISBN 0-521-81208-9. £50.
